recipesJson.name: Phucker Cookies
recipesJson.author: Philosaphucker
recipesJson.description:
I wanted to mix INW Cactus into CAP sugar cookie and make something tasty. After quite a bit of work, I managed to create a warm, soft, cactus cookie with a sugar glaze. Full recipe notes here: https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/5rybyl/phucker_cookies/
This balancing act requires some patience, so give it 10-14 days to steep.

reviews.text: I knew this was going to be good when I got to sample an earlier version with slightly more or less of one ingredient. Finally got around to trying the final version. Wow! I can't believe this Phucker pulled off a Cactus Cookie!

Wow. I'm testing this every day since I mixed it. It slowly developed from "Yuk" over "That's interesting" to "10 days he wrote, put it down". I'm on day 7 now. How will this continue? How is this possible? Witchcraft?
